author: pyang
msg: Patch applied for HARMONY-1379 ([classlib][nio_char] CharsetEncoder.encode(CharBuffer in) doesn't throw expected MalformedInputException when encodeLoop returns malformed coder result and report flag is enabled.)

msg: Improve jmx releated factory beans and put them in their own package
Add a boolean flag on container to specify if a jmx connector should be created

author: crossley
msg: Synchronise colours to match the current pelt skin.

that had less content than the length of the left-hand menu to have a dark-blue
